detailsOfAchievement: Since the registration, society has established three schools in Allahabad (UP) for increasing the rate of literacy particulary in educationally backward blocks. For economically and socially development two self help groups of ten desressed ladies are formed and both groups are working well and all members are fully satisfied.they are earning sufficient for their livelihood. In cultural events for promoting the buddhist philosphy, studies and activities, two nation wide programmes have been organised by the society (Buddha Mahaparinirvaan Tak) this was the international event inaugurated by the 17th Karmapa Trinley Thaye Dorje. For Literacy campaign every year on 14th April SHIKSHA DIWAS has been celebrating where all the institution private and govt. are invited to give the detail introduction to masses of students from different areas. One yearly magazine named "KAARVAAN" publish frequently for overall awareness specially for students and parents. On 14th November for children from below poverty line a mega programme is organised every year. So these are the activities from our society. The details will be reflected from our annual report. Thanks.
